lead_paragraph: REISMAN--Donald, of Bayside, Queens and Boynton Beach, Florida, passed peacefully in his sleep Sunday morning, January 31st. Donald was a devoted husband, father, brother, grandfather, uncle and greatuncle to his adoring family. Service Tuesday, 11:15am at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 W. 76th St. 1/3
